content: Inspired by the Beatles, which Swedish pop group went on to become one of the most commercially successful acts in the history of popular music?

I believe you're referring to ABBA, the legendary Swedish pop group that rose to fame in the 1970s. ABBA was indeed inspired by the Beatles and went on to achieve massive international success, becoming one of the best-selling music artists of all time. Their unique sound, catchy melodies, and powerful vocals have left an indelible mark on the world of pop music.
